segmentosSRT.text:
If you don't fight the Reds,
you fight the KMT.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
But who will look after my wife,
my kids, my old mother?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Forget it. Try to save your own skin.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
if I weren't looking for my brother,
I wouldn't be wearing this uniform.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
Must be tens of thousands
of us trapped here.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Was it from some dead officer?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Besides, we're from the same town.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Lao Quan, the place is deserted.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: The Reds must be on the attack.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: You want to go home, don't run.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
The Reds treat POWs well.
I've been one before.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: The coat's from my brother's unit.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: No, it's better if I wear it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: The only child I have left.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00
